text: Eina amuk hanna lakpada eigi Tengban Mapuna eibu nakhoigi mangda ekaiba nanghangadra haina, amasung mamangda pap toukhiba kayasing aduga padongningbagi amotpa wakhal amadi nupa nupi lannabagi lamchat naidaba thabaksing adudagi pukning hongdaba makhoisinggidamak eina tengtha naowoigadra haina eina kijei.
